com.baristamatic.inventory
Class SingleBaristaInventory

java.lang.Object
  com.baristamatic.inventory.SingleBaristaInventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Inventory
public class SingleBaristaInventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements Inventory

This class provides access to a single and distinct inventory of component ingredients for the Baristamatic simulator.

Version:
1.0, 09/04/11, 1.1, 09/08/11, 1.2, 09/14/11
Author:
Tom Stewart 
seasonedgeek@mac.com

consumeResources

public void consumeResources(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> recipe)
This method consumes resources during drink preparation. It reduces the total number of in-stock units, per ingredient, as directed by the drink recipe.
